msg: Issue UIMA-2565: uimaj-core doesn't build on JDK 7
- Use full type name org.apache.uima.cas.Type where necessary to avoid clash with Window.Type
- Added generic types to several collections and removed then unnecessary type casts
- Added a missing @Override annotation on an anonymous sub-class of WindowAdapter
